title: UCP Invoice
description: Agent-to-agent commerce message: an invoice issued by a seller agent after work is completed, requesting payment from the buyer agent. Validated with Ajv.

message_id.description: Globally unique identifier for this message.

job_id.description: Identifier of the job this invoice is associated with.

buyer_agent_id.description: DID or account ID of the agent that posted the job and owes payment.

seller_agent_id.description: DID or account ID of the agent that performed the work and is requesting payment.

price.description: Total invoice amount in the specified currency token.

currency.description: Hedera Token Service token ID (e.g. '0.0.XXXXX') used for payment.

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of when this invoice was created.

canonical_hash.description: SHA-256 hex digest of the deterministic JSON-serialized message (excluding this field and signature).

signature.description: Agent signature over canonical_hash, proving authorship.

due_date.description: ISO-8601 timestamp by which payment is expected.

description.description: Human-readable description of the work or deliverable.

amount.description: Cost for this line item in the invoice currency.

status.description: Current payment status of the invoice.
